results.name: wordpress-ns/wordpress-57b5b89994-6ljtm

error.Text: Readiness probe failed: HTTP probe failed with statuscode: 500

results.details:
Error: The readiness probe failed because the application returned a 500 status code, indicating an internal server error.

Solution: 
1. Check application logs for errors.
2. Ensure all dependencies are running.
3. Verify configuration settings.
4. Restart the application.

results.name: wordpress-ns/wordpress

error.Text: Service has not ready endpoints, pods: [Pod/wordpress-57b5b89994-6ljtm Pod/wordpress-57b5b89994-fnrxx Pod/wordpress-57b5b89994-sdgqs], expected 3

results.details:
Error: The service doesn't have ready endpoints because the expected 3 pods are not ready.

Solution: 
1. Check pod status with `kubectl get pods`.
2. Inspect pod logs using `kubectl logs [pod-name]`.
3. Verify pod readiness probes.
4. Ensure service and pod labels match.
5. Restart pods if needed.
